description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync EA274WMI - 27" - LED-Backlit LCD Monitor
The 27" NEC MultiSync EA274WMi is a WQHD widescreen LCD for high-performance enterprise users that require advanced technologies and full feature sets. Designed to enhance work performance, this widescreen model features IPS panel technology with wide viewing angles (178Â° horizontal/vertical) and ergonomic adjustability.
The LED backlighting of the EA274WMi allows for a slimmer profile, lighter weight and increased power savings. This model also boasts a height-adjustable stand and full connectivity with DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI-D and VGA inputs. The EA274WMi includes touch-sensitive on screen display controls, streamlined cable management and ControlSync technology, which allows users to control up to six units in a multi-monitor configuration.

features: Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately), integrated cable management
